product_entries.full_product_description:
Supply, erection, fabrication, testing of MS black steel pipe Heavy grade of thickness 5.4mm conforming to IS : 1239 Part -1 including all fittings viz. Elbows, tees, flanges, etc. reduces clamps, MS support dash fasteners etc. including painting the pipe with two coats of approved primer and two coats of approved  paint. Pipe joints shall be grooved with groove coupling. All related civil work, supports etc shall be of vendor's scope.
c | 80 mm NB
product_entries.feature_or_specifications: grade: heavy, thickness: 5.4mm, standard: IS : 1239 Part -1, fittings: elbows, tees, flanges, etc. reduces clamps, ms support dash fasteners, painting: two coats of approved primer and two coats of approved paint, pipe joints: grooved with groove coupling, civil work: all related civil work, supports etc shall be of vendor's scope

product_entries.full_product_description: Supply, installation, testing and commissioning of aspiration detector with CMOS imager combined with multiple photodiode for reliable very early warning in a wide range of environments with minimal nuisance alarms. The detector should have 4 pipe inlet and min 100m pipelength support per inlet.The detector should have Smart on-board filter retains dust count and remaining filter life for predictable maintenance& coverage area of min 5000 Sq.
product_entries.size: pipe inlet: 4, pipelength support per inlet: min 100m, coverage area: min 5000 Sq.
product_entries.feature_or_specifications: imager: CMOS, photodiode: multiple, feature: reliable very early warning in a wide range of environments with minimal nuisance alarms, filter: smart on-board filter retains dust count and remaining filter life for predictable maintenance
